pricing_notes: Pricing includes a base subscription fee plus additional fees for identified visitor services.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Designed for advertisers to restore website visitor retargeting and conversion signals.
features: Enriched and targetable contact data for both known profiles and unknown anonymous visitors
Encrypted audiences sent to Google Ads, Meta Ads Custom Audiences and Meta Conversions API
Fully restore signal loss due to Meta Pixel cookie deprecation

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Focused on email marketers to enhance email flows and contact tracking.
features: Contact data and on-site behavior tracking of identified visitors
Fully restore returning contact signal loss due to third-party cookie deprecation
Native or API integration with ESPs, CRMs and direct mail solutions
Suite of email deliverability optimization tools

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Combines features for advertisers and email marketers.
features: Contact data and on-site behavior tracking of identified visitors
Fully restore signal loss due to Meta Pixel and third-party cookie deprecation
Encrypted audiences sent to Google Ads, Meta Ads and Meta Conversions API
Native or API integration with ESPs, CRMs and direct mail solutions
Suite of email deliverability optimization tools

original_app_metadata.name: Customers.ai
original_app_metadata.description: Customers.ai is a lead-generating and outbound automation platform. Find who your customers are and contact them.
